post.body: urban outfitters, irritated/amused by all their obama shwag cuz I know their parent company is a big republican party donor...
good luck bdub!!!
mechanic, getting car checked out. Power steering sounds like eeeeeeeee. Sounds like I'll be here for 3 hours! Help!!
no, but i can *record* pedal steel! and it was MVA style, as a matter of fact!
whoa awesome show @ eddies. before sleep want to say THANK THE FUCK OUT OF YOU to everyone who came and cate who made cookies : ) xoxo
Driving 2 bicker-y siblings 500 miles, family hopping. Bless david sedaris, listening to his family dysfunction is saving us from ours : )
TNG marathon! Merry Christmas!!
My grandmother just told me that my fleece workout jacket makes me look like Michelle Obama
Thawing. Coldest run ever! I think my ear fell off back on that bridge...
Oh, ominous airbag light
vedado holiday cocktail hour evening = success! jason bolte is my hero : )
Finger bleeding profusely. I am a moron
sorry, but "cheers" is never an appropriate way to end an email. so stop doing it.
on the one hand, i'd really love to grab a beer with blue-era Joni Mitchell. on the other, we'd probably bum each other out
oh smile. there were SO MANY beautiful blue birds in piedmont park this morning. and they were so bright against the brown grass & leaves
wtf?! mini wheats tells me they're proven to improve kids' atentiveness by 20%!! maybe that's why i wasn't allowed to have sugared cereal?
I just realized that my album doesn't have a single 6/8 ballad... Not a one! How could this have happenned?!
Oh, Atlanta. I'm forcing myself not to use the AC in my car out principal
didn't the first three pretty much cover wolverine's origins? i'm skeptical...
i'm enjoying being in a recording bubble & disengaged from every twist and turn of the 24 hour news cycle. governor who? shoe thrower what?
